name: Ford Prefect Goes To Therapy
description:
This project is:

1. A  demo of a Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy fangame that is not intended to be finished (although a similar full game will be made with a different name)
2. Part of a fanfiction series hosted on AO3 currently titled "Red Supergiant: AU Where Ford's Alcoholism Is Taken Seriously".

If you are not familiar with the fanfiction series of which this fangame is an installment, you will either not wish to play it or prefer to play it after reading the rest of the series.

Otherwise, this is the demo of what was going to be the fourth entry of Red Supergiant before I decided to take it in a different direction that warranted a rewrite. Please consult the AO3 entry for this game for more information about it and the rewrite.
